citations.narrative:
Automatic watering troughs were overgrown with algae, collecting at the edges of the container. The bottom of the
container was covered in algal debris, although the water itself was clear enough to see the debris at the bottom. All
water receptacles shall be kept clean and sanitary, which includes cleaning regularly to minimize algae growth and debris.
Correct by 28 February 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the attending veterinarian.
End Section

narrative:
3.130 
   
Watering. 
Automatic watering troughs were overgrown with algae, collecting at the edges of the container.  The bottom of the 
container was covered in algal debris, although the water itself was clear enough to see the debris at the bottom.  All 
water receptacles shall be kept clean and sanitary, which includes cleaning regularly to minimize algae growth and debris. 
 
Correct by 28 February 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the attending veterinarian. 
 
End Section
